DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial compare combination 400 mg ibuprofen 100 mg caffeine 400 mg ibuprofen alone feed condition
DOC.brief_title: To Determine Blood Concentrations Ibuprofen Caffeine Tablet Against Ibuprofen Alone From Another Tablet
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male female , 18 50 year ( inclusive ) time screen . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . Body mass le 50 kg . Medical history , vital sign , physical examination , standard 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) laboratory investigation must clinically acceptable within laboratory reference range relevant laboratory test , unless PI considers deviation irrelevant purpose study . Nonsmokers mild moderate smoker ( < = 10 cigarette pipe per day ) . Further inclusion criterion apply Exclusion criterion : Evidence psychiatric disorder , antagonistic personality , poor motivation , emotional intellectual problem likely limit validity consent participate study limit ability comply protocol requirement . Current alcohol use > 21 unit alcohol per week male > 14 unit alcohol per week female . One unit equal beer [ 200 mL/10 ounce ] , wine [ 100 mL/4 ounce ] , distilled spirit [ 25 mL/1 ounce ] ) per day Regular exposure substance abuse ( alcohol ) within past year . Use medication , prescribe overthecounter herbal remedy , within 2 week first administration IMP except affect outcome study opinion PI . In study concomitant use hormonal contraceptive allow . Participation another study experimental drug , last administration previous IMP within 8 week ( within 5 elimination halflives chemical entity 2 elimination halflives antibody insulin ) , whichever long ) administration IMP study , discretion PI . Treatment within previous 3 month first administration IMP drug welldefined potential adversely affect major organ system . History hypersensitivity allergy ( angioedema urticaria ) IMP excipients related medication ( Aspirin NSAID ) . Diagnosis hypotension make screening period . Diagnosis hypertension make screening period current diagnosis hypertension . Resting pulse > 100 beat per minute < 40 beat per minute screening period , either supine standing . Renal impairment . Positive urine screen drug abuse . In case positive result urine screen drug abuse may repeat discretion PI . Further exclusion criterion apply
